item.title: Donna Brazile's Corrupt Silent Partner
item.description: Since its revelation in WikiLeaks two weeks ago, Donna Brazile has been justly excoriated for cheating on behalf of Hillary Clinton by passing along a debate question. However, an important aspect to this story has been overlooked. As the saying goes, it takes two to tango. Yes, Donna Brazile sent a critically beneficial piece of information - but Hillary Clinton accepted it. Mrs. Clinton accepted it (stealing), used it (cheating), and said nothing (lying).

item.title: With 2 Weeks to Go, Don't Get Fooled Again
item.description: https://youtu.be/SHhrZgojY1Q Donna Brazile colluded with Hillary’s campaign and Roland Martin to feed debate to questions to Hillary before a debate. Hillary personally ordered violent protesters to disrupt Trump events. Hillary, Brazile, and PACS broke the law by colluding on disrupting Trump events. Hillary Clinton trashed and intimidated the women her husband raped. Hillary Clinton stole classified material and her minions offered bribes the FBI to help cover up the crimes.
